comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Possibly associated with a competition. See NYT of May 15, 1913 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9504E1D91F3AE633A... FINAL TEST FOR EAST SIDE BABIES; Even Stuss Games Pale Into Insignificance Beside the University Settlement's Contest. For the next few days the interest of east side mothers will be centred in the University Settlement's healthy baby contest,
